installation.script:
echo "### Downloading S1X ###"
export HOME=/mnt/server
wget -P /mnt/server/ $DOWNLOAD_URL
cd /mnt/server && unzip $FILENAME
cd /mnt/server && rm $FILENAME
cd /mnt/server && wget https://github.com/auroramod/h1-mod/releases/download/v2.0.1/h1-mod.exe
chmod 755 h1-mod.exe

# Installing i4wm log server
if [ ${IW4M} == 1 ]
then
# Download the iw4m log server
cd /mnt/server
wget "https://github.com/RaidMax/IW4MAdmin-GameLogServer/releases/download/1.0.0/GameLogServer.zip"
unzip GameLogServer.zip
rm GameLogServer.zip
#Changes the IW4M Log Server Default Port 1625 to the Same as the server
sed -i "s/1625/${SERVER_PORT}/g" runserver.py 
fi

variables.name: IW4M Log Server - Enabled
variables.description: Installs a log server for IW4M Admin (on installation) and runs it on startup. This does not install IW4M Admin itself, run IW4M Admin on a separate container.
